segments.text: I bought it . I got a watch , too . The company that sells this car has a car club .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where you can buy lots of paraphernalia ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , and meet other drivers of the same car !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know girls love this kind of car . Look , it's got a sunroof ! Imagine ... a cool , starry night ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , you're going to use Sarah's car to go cruising for chicks ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I borrowed it to go shopping .
segments.speaker: S1
